definition: door/the opening panel of a door

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)
fan/sliding, hinged or detachable flat part of sth/classifier for doors, windows etc
to fan/to slap sb on the face

sentences.english: But the fish gate did the sons of Hassenaah build, who also laid the beams thereof, and set up the doors thereof, the locks thereof, and the bars thereof.
sentences.chinese: 哈西拿的子孫建立魚門，架橫樑，安門扇，和閂鎖。

sentences.english: He made the courtyard of the priests, and the large court and the doors for the court, and overlaid the doors with bronze.
sentences.chinese: 又建立祭司院和大院，並院門，用銅包裹門扇。

sentences.english: The hardware hinge adopts super-heavy design, and the door leaf can be opened easily.
sentences.chinese: 五金門鉸採用超重型設計，門扇輕鬆開啓。

sentences.english: The door leaves of the sliding air door are changed into the form of sliding opening and closing from the prior flat opening.
sentences.chinese: 本實用新型的門扇由目前的平開改爲推拉開閉。

sentences.english: C. Fix the hinge on the door leaf with tapping screw.
sentences.chinese: 在門扇上用自攻螺釘固定門扇頁面。

sentences.english: C. Fix the hinge on the door leaf with tapping screw.
sentences.chinese: 在門扇上用自攻螺釘固定門扇頁面。

sentences.english: Thou shalt write them upon the posts and the doors of thy house.
sentences.chinese: 還應刻在你房屋的門框和門扇上。

sentences.english: As the door turneth upon its hinges, so doth the slothful upon his bed.
sentences.chinese: 懶人在牀榻上輾轉，猶如門扇在樞紐上旋轉。

sentences.english: Nature hard solid wood structure of door leaf.

definition: to tolerate is to nurture an evildoer (idiom); spare the rod and spoil the child
lintel (of a door)/fig. family's social status
drinking party/to go on a binge/to paint the town red
after the calamity, renewed life (idiom); new lease of life
lit. crow and peacock make no sound/absolute silence (idiom); not a single voice can be heard/absolute silence
